```{r}
DamInfo <- DamInfo %>%
  makeFactors(damID)
OffspringInfo <- OffspringInfo %>%

Cycles_off <- Cycles_off %>%
  makeFactors(c(mouseID, cycleID))
slicingInfo <- slicingInfo %>%

cellInfo <- cellInfo %>%
```

```{r}
OffspringInfo <- OffspringInfo %>%
  left_join(
    DamInfo,
    by = "damID"
  )

slicingInfo <- slicingInfo %>%
  left_join(
    OffspringInfo,
    by = "mouseID"
  )

cellInfo <- cellInfo %>%
  left_join(
    slicingInfo,
    by = "mouseID"
  )

optoOutput <- optoOutput %>%
  left_join(
    cellInfo,
    by = "cellID"
  )
```

```{r}
optoFidelityPlot <- function(
  df,
  lineTypeVar,
  useLineType,
  xVar = redFreq,
  thisXTitle = "frequency (Hz)"
){
  ytitle <- "(# events / # stims) * 100"
  title <- NULL
  individualLines <- FALSE
  meanLines <- TRUE
  zoom_x <- FALSE
  xmin <- NULL
  xmax <- NULL
  zoom_y <- FALSE
  ymin <- NULL
  ymax <- NULL
  indivLineAlpha = 0.7
  indivLineSize <- 1
  errorBarWidth <- 0.3
  meanAlpha <- 1
  meanLineSize <- 1
  errorBarSize <- 0.5
  errorBarAlpha <- 1
  textSize <- 16
  axisSize <- 1
  
  plot <- df %>%
    ggplot(
      aes(x = {{ xVar }}, y = fidelity, color = {{ lineTypeVar }})
    ) +
      plot_line_geom_layers (
        useLineType = useLineType, # TRUE/FALSE
        lineTypeVar = {{ lineTypeVar }},
        lineGroupVar = {{ lineGroupVar }},
        xtitle = thisXTitle, #x axis label
        ytitle = ytitle, #y axis label
        title = title, # plot title
        individualLines = individualLines, # plot individual lines
        meanLines = meanLines, # plot mean lines with SE
        zoom_x = zoom_x, # Zoom to part of x axis
        xmin = xmin,
        xmax = xmax,
        zoom_y = zoom_y, # Zoom to part of y axis
        ymin = ymin,
        ymax = ymax,
        indivLineAlpha = indivLineAlpha,
        indivLineSize = indivLineSize,
        errorBarWidth = errorBarWidth,
        meanLineSize = meanLineSize,
        meanAlpha = meanAlpha,
        errorBarSize = errorBarSize,
        # errorBarColor = errorBarColor,
        errorBarAlpha = errorBarAlpha,
        textSize = textSize,
        axisSize = axisSize
      ) +
    geom_point()
}
```
